name: Messenger
description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
descriptionRaw: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
story:
It was said in days gone by,
The people of Liyue passed messages by bow and arrow.
"Wouldn't bystanders get hurt, you ask?"
"Suffice to say, there's a good reason this bow is an antique..."
The antique shop owner rubbed their chin and smiled.
effectTemplateRaw: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>{0}</color> ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

r1.description: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

r3.description: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 150% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

r4.description: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 175% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

r5.description: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
